fresh_translation.text: This is how it is: God sent Jesus to be the light and show us the right way. But some people liked their sins more than the light because they didn’t want to change. They chose to stay in darkness instead of coming close to God and His love.

source: αὕτη δέ ἐστιν ἡ κρίσις, ὅτι τὸ φῶς ἐλήλυθεν εἰς τὸν κόσμον, καὶ ἠγάπησαν οἱ ἄνθρωποι μᾶλλον τὸ σκότος ἢ τὸ φῶς· ἦν γὰρ πονηρὰ αὐτῶν τὰ ἔργα.

related_verses.text: The light shines in the darkness, and the darkness has not overcome it.
For you were once darkness, but now you are light in the Lord. Live as children of light.
If we say we have fellowship with him while we walk in darkness, we lie and do not practice the truth.
But the way of the wicked is like deep darkness; they do not know over what they stumble.
Therefore be careful lest the light in you be darkness.

translation_notes: To enhance the understanding of God's light and love for a seven-year-old, I will rephrase the translation to highlight the positive aspects of coming closer to God while addressing the idea that some people choose to hide from Him. fresh_translation.text: Some people do bad things and don’t want anyone to know, so they stay away from God’s loving light. But God’s light shows us the good and helps us make better choices. He really wants us to come closer to Him and find happiness by doing what is right.
